title: BRIEF-Pembina And Kml Agree To Amend Arrangement To Include Preferred Shareholders
text:
BRIEF-Pembina And Kml Agree To Amend Arrangement To Include Preferred Shareholders

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 10, 2019 18:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pembina And Kml Agree To Amend Arrangement To Include Preferred Shareholders Kinder Morgan (NYSE: ) Canada Ltd : * PEMBINA AND KML AGREE TO AMEND ARRANGEMENT TO INCLUDE PREFERRED SHAREHOLDERS * KINDER MORGAN CANADA LTD - BOARD AGREED WITH PEMBINA PIPELINE TO AMEND AND RESTATE PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED ARRANGEMENT AGREEMENT DATED AUGUST 20 * KINDER MORGAN CANADA - BOARD OF KML HAS UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED AMENDMENTS TO PROPOSED TRANSACTION

BRIEF-Pembina And Kml Agree To Amend Arrangement To Include Preferred Shareholders
description: BRIEF-Pembina And Kml Agree To Amend Arrangement To Include Preferred Shareholders
